entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
